title: Performance Indicator Schema
description: Schema for the Performance Indicator domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

performanceIndicatorID.description: A unique identifier for the performance indicator

title.description: The name or label of the performance indicator

description.description: A brief explanation of what the indicator measures

unitOfMeasure.description: The unit in which performance is measured (e.g. %, $AUD)

baselineValue.description: The starting reference point for performance

targetValue.description: The target or goal value to be achieved

variance.description: The calculated difference between currentValue and targetValue

variancePercentage.description: The percentage difference from the target value

thresholdType.description: General threshold logic, e.g. higher-is-better or lower-is-better

level.description: Label for the threshold level (e.g. warning, critical)

alertMessage.description: Message to display or send when threshold is breached

notificationRecipients.description: List of roles or individuals to be notified

targetDate.description: The date by which the target should be achieved

validFrom.description: Start date of the performance measurement period

validTo.description: End date of the performance measurement period

aggregationPeriod.description: The timeframe used to aggregate performance data

assessmentFrequency.description: How often the performance is assessed (e.g. weekly, monthly)

evaluativeModel.description: Describes a model used to analyse or interpret performance trends

modelType.description: The name of the model (e.g. movingAverage, trendLine)

description.description: Explanation of the model's role or calculation logic

dataSource.description: Source system or method used to collect performance data

owner.description: The person or role responsible for this indicator

orgUnitTitle.description: The organizational unit to which this indicator belongs

leadingIndicators.description: Metrics that show early progress before outcomes materialize

description.description: Explanation of how this indicator signals future performance

triggerThreshold.description: Value at which action should be taken

leadTime.description: Typical time between indicator change and outcome impact

confidenceLevel.description: Estimated confidence (0-100%) that this indicator predicts the outcome

currentValue.description: Current measurement for this leading indicator

potentialMetrics.description: New measurement categories for innovative initiatives

metricName.description: Name of the potential new metric

description.description: Explanation of what this metric would measure

valueProposition.description: How this metric would add value to performance measurement

implementationChallenges.description: Potential challenges in implementing this metric

dataRequirements.description: Data needed to calculate this metric

estimatedImplementationTime.description: Estimated time required to implement this metric

outcomeTimeframes.description: When different results are expected to manifest

catalyticEvents.description: Key events that may accelerate or modify outcomes

impactDescription.description: Description of how this event would impact outcomes

estimatedDate.description: Estimated date when this event might occur

measurement.description: Specify objective, subjective, or proxy measurement approaches

component.description: Name of the objective measurement component

method.description: Method used for collecting this data

weight.description: Weight of this component in the overall metric (0-100%)

validationProcess.description: Process used to validate this measurement

component.description: Name of the subjective measurement component

assessmentMethod.description: Method used for subjective assessment (e.g., survey, expert review)

assessors.description: Roles or individuals conducting the assessment

weight.description: Weight of this component in the overall metric (0-100%)

biasControlMeasures.description: Measures to control bias in subjective assessment

proxyComponents.description: Indirect measurement components used when direct measurement isn't possible

component.description: Name of the proxy measurement component

targetMeasure.description: What this proxy is intended to represent

correlationStrength.description: Estimated correlation between proxy and target (0-1)

validationMethod.description: Method used to validate the proxy's correlation

limitations.description: Known limitations of this proxy measure

weight.description: Weight of this component in the overall metric (0-100%)

dataNormalization.description: Methods for normalizing or standardizing different measurement components

description.description: Explanation of how normalization is applied

parameters.description: Parameters used in the normalization process
